name: double-team
effect: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.
short_effect: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Creates illusory copies to raise evasiveness.
flavor_text.emerald: Creates illusory copies to raise evasiveness.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The user creates illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
